title: Forests of Farallon
description: SHE'S GONE! How can Jeremy sit through another boring high school class when his life has been turned inside out? His older sister, Sasha, mysteriously vanished months ago, leaving him to help care for his kid sister and older special needs brother without her. Despite the whispers, he has to believe... SHE'S ALIVE! Together with his friends, Whytney and Eric, Jeremy's search leads to an unknown realm of primitive people and incredible creatures. They find themselves accidental participants in a death race that holds civilization in its claws. CAN THEY FIND HER IN TIME?
author: Ben McKinnon
